name: Long Way from Home (Professor_Oak)
description:
Long Way from Home is a 3D isometric puzzle game, based in a fictional magical world where everything has gone wrong. The game takes inspirations from co-op puzzle games and introduces two heroes, a bird and a tree who are stranded far away from home. 

A student project by Akash Oak.

If you have any feedback, please contact me!

Cheers!

Controls

W,S,A,D - Move the bird

Space - Make the bird Jump

Arrow keys - Move Tree

Left - Click Destroy Red Barriers
